__e: So that's why my letters came back.
I rather hoped that my letters would make you trust me.
I wrongly trusted my valet to deliver the many letters I wrote to you.
I'm sure you're busy, but even if your letters were 200 pages, they wouldn't be long enough for your mother.
Look, I just... I really think you need to deal with your letters.
They had your name on them. They had your signature on them. You made money from them.
Come, I will give you way for these your letters and do't the speedier that you may direct me to him from whom you brought them.
OK, now we've opened all these letters, and I've seen all I need to see for the time being.
Frank mentioned you in his letters.
Is he the one who wrote me all those letters?
In this last one, he states he'll never send these letters to that woman because he's married to God.
Hmm. Well, if that's true, then all the letters my grandmother wrote me ended with, "Go fuck yourself.
When you see them, tell them that their letters kept me sane.
You had letters from my daughter the whole time?
But taking their letters? is that not like taking pennies from a wishing well?
- Some of the letters are from Peter.
Those letters in there are 10-to-one from girls.
